document.full_text: freddy garcia, who won the no. 5 starter's job out of spring training, dazzled with his ability to keep texas hitters off-balance, giving the yankees some much-needed positive news.
document.title: yankees 5, rangers 2: savvy start by garcia helps yanks fill a void
lines_and_colors: freddy garcia, who won the no. 5 starter's job out of spring training, dazzled with his ability to keep texas hitters off-balance, giving the yankees some much-needed positive news.
